full_description:
TOTAL TP18001 800W Gasoline Generator

The TOTAL TP18001 800W Gasoline Generator is a powerful and portable option for use at home, camping, and other outdoor activities. It has a 1.8 HP 2-stroke engine, a 650W constant output, and an 800W max output, making it appropriate for a variety of appliances and devices. The TOTAL TP18001 800W Gasoline Generator operates at 230V and 50Hz, making it compliant with most electrical standards. It has a 3000 rpm aluminum coil alternator, an air-cooled cooling system, and a 4L fuel tank with a 13-hour operating time. The TOTAL TP18001 800W Gasoline Generator is only 16 Kg in weight and has a handle for convenient portability. This adaptable and long-lasting generator is ideal for any outdoor application.

2-stroke Engine with 1.8 HP

The TOTAL TP18001 800W Gasoline Generator is powered by a 1.8 HP 2-stroke engine with a displacement of 63cc. The engine starts easily and operates smoothly and efficiently. The engine is also quieter than other generators on the market, with a noise level of 91 dB.

650W Steady Output and 800W Max Output

The generator can deliver a steady electrical output of 650W and a maximum electrical output of 800W. It can power various appliances and devices, such as lights, fans, TVs, laptops, and more. The TOTAL TP18001 800W Gasoline Generator has a voltage of 230V and a rated frequency of 50Hz, which are compatible with most electrical standards.

Aluminum Coil Alternator with 3000 RPM

The TOTAL TP18001 800W Gasoline Generator has an aluminum coil alternator, which is durable and efficient. The alternator has a rated speed of 3000 rpm, which ensures a stable and high-quality power output. The alternator also has an air-cooled cooling system, which prevents overheating and prolongs the lifespan of the generator.

4L Fuel Tank with 13 Hours Run Time

The TOTAL TP18001 800W Gasoline Generator has a large fuel tank capacity of 4L, which can hold enough gasoline for up to 13 hours of continuous run time. It also has a fuel gauge that shows the remaining fuel level. The TOTAL TP18001 800W Gasoline Generator is economical and convenient to use, as you don't have to refill the tank frequently.
